Destroy all enchantments:
self.game.apply_to_battlefield(
		lambda p: p.destroy(),
		lambda p: p.is_enchantment)
Destroy all creatures:
self.game.apply_to_battlefield(
		lambda p: p.destroy(),
		lambda p: p.is_creature)
Destroy all artifacts:
self.game.apply_to_battlefield(
		lambda p: p.destroy(),
		lambda p: p.is_artifcat)
Destroy all lands:
self.game.apply_to_battlefield(
		lambda p: p.destroy(),
		lambda p: p.is_land)
